name: A small world (Liusuwanxia)
description:
Well,this is our first game developed in Ludum Dare. To be honeest, we can make it better with more time, while you can also enjoy the demo version. This game happened in a small world, which is the table of the major role. Player must pick up useful items and use them at a definite place. When you get out of the room, another cute guy are waiting for you...

This game is developed with Unity3d and play for free, if you like our game, please comment and let us know.
